item.title: Being 10x engineer in my first job
item.description:
Recently, I came across a post on LinkedIn with the eye-catching title, ‚ÄúI think I‚Äôve met a 10x engineer.‚Äù But as I read through the post, I started to have doubts. The author described how one of their colleagues had managed to fix a bunch of complex bugs in a short amount of time, which left them in awe. ü§î

But is that really what defines a 10x engineer? It brought back memories of my own experience as a so-called 10x engineer during my first job!
